safety.title: Safety & Community in Barcelona
safety.subtitle: Barcelona is consistently ranked as one of the safest and most welcoming cities for LGBTQ+ people worldwide.
safety.testimonial1Quote: Coming to Barcelona was the best decision of my life. As a gay man from Mexico, I never felt truly safe being myself. Here, I can hold my partner's hand in public without fear.
safety.testimonial2Quote: Barcelona gave me the freedom to explore my identity as a non-binary person. The university has gender-neutral bathrooms and my professors use my pronouns.

partners.title: Partner Universities
partners.subtitle: Study with pride at Barcelona's leading universities that champion diversity, inclusion, and LGBTQ+ education
partners.upfDescription: UPF is a public university in Barcelona that ranks among the top universities in Spain and Europe. Known for its modern approach to education and strong commitment to diversity and inclusion.
partners.upfCourseDescription: An innovative course exploring LGBTQ+ identities, history, and contemporary issues in society.
partners.upfHighlight4: Located in the vibrant Poblenou district
partners.ubDescription: The oldest and largest university in Barcelona, offering comprehensive programs across all academic disciplines with a strong commitment to diversity.
partners.uabDescription: A leading research university with innovative programs and strong support for LGBTQ+ students through various campus organizations.
partners.esadeDescription: Top-ranked business school with a strong focus on diversity, inclusion, and global perspectives in business education.
partners.bseDescription: Prestigious graduate school specializing in economics, with a diverse and international student body.
partners.step1Description: Explore programs and courses that align with your interests and career goals.
partners.step2Description: Gather required documents, transcripts, and prepare your application materials.
partners.step3Description: Submit your application and begin your visa process with our guidance.
partners.helpDescription: Our team can help you find the perfect program that matches your academic goals and personal values. All our partner universities are committed to creating inclusive, welcoming environments for LGBTQ+ students.
